Description:
Purpose of the Job:To contribute to the business success through the development and the implementation of an actionable Oncology marketing strategy leading to a profitable and competitively positioned brand.
Maximize the success of Oncology brands & contribute actively to the development of a disease area vision and strategy.
To achieve financial objectives, leveraging available resources in the most effective mannerKey Areas of Responsibility:Mapping the key KOLs in his/her areas and developing the tactical operation plan in agreement with his/her manager
Deep understanding for Health care system of Baghdad and Middle area including decision making process, influencers, funding map and stakeholders.
Initiates and follows up on implementation of accounts access solutions in collaboration with other functions to expand and sustain access to eligible patients.
Achieving the marketing strategy and sales target
Executing all sales and marketing plans and regularly report the ROI in a well-structured and calculated manner and come up proactively with clear required actions on accounts’ level, KOLs’ level, or areas’ level.
Complying with all regulations regarding interactions with healthcare professionals, distribution of samples, etc.Minimum Criteria and CompetenciesExperience in pharmaceutical industry with successful achievement and Sustained Performance track record.
Experience in Oncology area is an asset
Pharmaceutical Education degree is a must.
Team Player and proven high leadership capabilities according to his colleagues’ and managers’ opinions.
Strong leadership skills specifically emotional intelligence, public relation, and negotiation skills.
Ability to interact and manage a range of stakeholders both internally and externally.
knowledge of presentation, negotiation, and leadership techniques.
Skill in interpersonal network relationship with internal and external customers.
Demonstrate excellent oral and written communication skills.
Availability for business trips.
